text: An accentor is a small bird in the genus family of Prunellidae. They can be found in northern Asia and Europe. The mountain accentor, for example, lives in northern Asia, while the hedge-accentor or dunnock can be found in England. Accentors have been described as having slender bills with sharp points. They also have rounded wings. ==References== Category:Passeri
title: Accentor
